array.string: I fell in love with a girl, and we vowed to love each other forever.
But one day, the devil seized all of her memories, including our love.
And told me to find all the fragments, to let her recover memories.
These memory fragments are scattered in 30 cities of the world.
I need to win these cities in order to obtain memory fragmentation.
For the vow, I embarked on a journey to find the memory fragmentation.
